gui

Interface GameViewModel


  • public interface GameViewModel
    Interface to implement for communication between gui and game logic.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Karolina Jonzen and Alexander Ekstrom

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTroop(FigureRepresentation figure)
      Adds a new troop type from the figure given as parameter.
      void buyCreature(int index)
      Adds a new creature to the attacking players horde based on the index given as parameter.
      void buyCreature(int index, long time)
      Adds a new teleporter creature to the attacking players horde based on the index and teleporter drop time given as paramters.
      void changeSizeOfGameCanvas(int width)
      Adapts the size of the game canvas to the center panel of gui.
      int getCredits()
      Gets the attacking player's current credit.
      java.util.ArrayList<HighScoreInfo> getFromDataBase()
      Gets an ArrayList of the 10 highest scores with the corresponding name, time and level from data base.
      int getHitpoints(int index)
      Gets the hit points of a creature with the index given as parameter.
      LevelInfo getLevelInfo()
      Gets information about current level.
      int getScoreGoal()
      Gets the level score goal.
      void initGame(View view, int levelIndex)
      Initiates the game with the level index given as parameter.
      void insertIntoDataBase(java.lang.String name, int score, java.sql.Time time, java.lang.String level)
      Inserts the given parameters into the database.
      void pauseGame() 
      void quitGame()
      Quits the game.
      void resumeGame() 
      void startGame()
